```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)
library(dplyr)
library(ggridges)
```



```{r cars}
reisenhappiness <- read.csv2("./datasets/happiness + reisen.csv")

```


```{r}
# Data cleaning 

## Top 3 
reisenhappinesstop3 <- filter(reisenhappiness, Land %in% c("Deutschland", "Frankreich", "Vereinigtes Königreich"))

## Deutschland
reisenhappinessde <- filter(reisenhappiness, Land == "Deutschland")

## Top 3 und letzte 3
reisenhappinesstopundflop <- filter(reisenhappiness, Land %in% c("Deutschland", "Frankreich", "Vereinigtes Königreich", "Zypern", "Luxemburg", "Malta"))

## Letzte drei 
reisenhappinessflop <-filter(reisenhappiness, Land %in% c("Zypern", "Luxemburg", "Malta"))
```


```{r}
#Alle im Vergleich Lollipop
ggplot(reisenhappiness, aes(x = Land, y = Reisende, color = whr, fill = whr))+
  geom_segment( aes(x = Land, xend= Land, y=0, yend= Reisende)) +
  geom_point( size=5, color="red", fill=alpha("orange", 0.3), alpha=0.7, shape=21, stroke=2)
```
```{r}
#Top 3 
ggplot(reisenhappinesstop3, aes(x = Land, y = Reisende, color = whr, fill = whr))+
  geom_col()

```

```{r}
#Letzten 3
ggplot(reisenhappinessflop, aes(x = fct_relevel(Land, "Zypern", "Luxemburg", "Malta"), y = Reisende, color = whr, fill = whr))+
  geom_col()
```

```{r}
#Top 3 und letzten 3 im Vergleich 
ggplot(reisenhappinesstopundflop, aes(x = fct_relevel(Land, "Deutschland", "Frankreich", "Vereinigtes Königreich", "Zypern", "Luxemburg", "Malta"), y = Reisende, color = whr, fill = whr))+
  geom_col()
```
